content: निरस् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To cast out, throw or drive away, give up, quit, drive or send back; निरस्तगांभीयर्मपात्तपुष्पकं <ls>Śi. 1. 55</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">9. 63.</ls> {@--2@} To destroy, ward off, defeat, annihilate; dispel; अह्नाय तावदरुणेन तमो निरस्तं <ls>R. 5. 70</ls>; रक्षांसे वेदीं परितो निरास्थत् <ls>Bk. 1. 12</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">2. 36.</ls> {@--3@} To turn out, remove, expel, banish; गृहान्निरस्ता न तेन वैदेहसुता मनस्तः <ls>R. 14. 84.</ls> {@--4@} To throw out, discharge (as arrows). {@--5@} To reject, repudiate, decline. {@--6@} To refute, confute, controvert (as arguments). {@--7@} To eclipse, obscure, throw into the back-ground; <ls>Bk. 1. 3.</ls> {@--8@} To tear out, strip off. {@--9@} To stretch out (as a hand).
